field.label: Remote address
field.help: Peer address where encapsulated gif packets will be sent.

field.label: Tunnel netmask / prefix
field.help: Netmask [ipv4] or prefix [ipv6] to use for this tunnel

field.label: Disable Ingress filtering
field.help: Ingress filtering on outer tunnel source can break tunnel operation in an asymmetrically routed networks, in which case this can be disabled by marking this option.

field.label: ECN friendly behavior
field.help: Note that the ECN friendly behavior violates RFC2893. This should be used in mutual agreement with the peer.

field.label: Description
field.help: You may enter a description here for your reference (not parsed).
